/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++14 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/bvh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/laplacian.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/mesh_processing_app.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/neighborhood.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/trackball.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mesh_proc.dir/src/viewer.cpp.o  -o mesh_proc -Wl,-rpath,/home/xenesis/SIA/sia_td3/external/pmp external/glfw/src/libglfw3.a external/glbinding/libglbinding.a external/SOIL/libSOIL.a external/pmp/libpmp.so.1.2.1 -lrt -lm -lX11 -lpthread -ldl -pthread -lGL -lGLU
